comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: ROCKEFELLER GIVES WORD; And Sea Breeze Camp, Child-Saving Station, Gets Ready to Open. April 17, 1910, Sunday Page 12, 770 words John D. Rockefeller has authorized the Association for Improving the Condition of the Poor to reopen Junior Sea Breeze for its fifth season. The child-saving station at Junior Sea Breeze is supported entirely by Mr. Rockefeller and has been in operation for four years at Sixty-fourth Street and East River, in the shadow of the Rockefeller Institute. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=980DEED81539E433A...
